Dialogs.Name: WhatDoYouLikeToDo
Dialogs.Dialog: Oh, so what do you like to do?

Dialogs.Name: ILoveToGoOnAdventure
Dialogs.Dialog: I love to go on an Adventure.

Dialogs.Name: IsThatSo
Dialogs.Dialog: Is that so? I've /size:up//color:blue/ALWAYS/color:white//size:init/ wanted to go on an adventure.

Dialogs.Name: ThatsGreat
Dialogs.Dialog: That's great. I'm about to go on a dangerous one now. I've been wanting someone to help me. Wanna tag along?

Dialogs.Name: WaitIDontHaveToFightRight
Dialogs.Dialog: WAIT, I DON'T HAVE TO FIGHT, RIGHT?

Dialogs.Name: NoIllBeDoingTheFighting
Dialogs.Dialog: No, I'll be doing the fighting. You can help me by making delicious food.

Dialogs.Name: OkayIllNeedFruits
Dialogs.Dialog: Okay, I'll need fruits and vegetables for that. How about we plant something and harvest it?
